video_prompt: A stylized anime woman advances, her flowing hair and open hoodie swaying. Cherry blossoms drift in the air and scatter underfoot. The scene shifts as she moves through an urban setting, revealing a building facade.
image_prompt: Full-body anime woman, slightly off-center left, walking outdoors amidst vibrant cherry blossoms and falling petals. High-angle, colorful, airy digital illustration. She has long dark wavy hair, large blue eyes, light blue ethereal earrings, a light pink baseball cap, light grey "NAUTICAL" crop top, frayed denim shorts, dark brown belt with gold buckle, open pink zip-up hoodie, chunky pink sneakers with light blue ankle socks. A black leather messenger bag hangs from her left shoulder, right hand in pocket. Bright sunny day. Background: blooming cherry trees, scattered petals on stone ground, partial brick building with dark windows and steps. (remove "c29" logo)
refined_video_prompt: A stylized anime woman continually moves forward, her hair flowing and open hoodie swaying. Cherry blossoms drift dynamically in the air, scattering under her advancing footsteps. The urban background continuously scrolls, revealing new building facades as she progresses.
